trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGOTH3THEDAWNTHRONE_00418_BERUDE_000_000<tab>A visitor? We do not get too many of you around here. If there is something you are curious to know, just ask.

TEXT_REGOTH3THEDAWNTHRONE_00418_BERUDE_000_010<tab>You want to know about <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>? I oversee the training of our Azim Bökh wrestlers. It is a traditional style of wrestling in the Steppe, which has been handed down through the generations.

TEXT_REGOTH3THEDAWNTHRONE_00418_BERUDE_000_011<tab>I may not look very intimidating, but do not be deceived. I have attained the rank of “Giant”─a title awarded only to winners of our grand competition.
TEXT_REGOTH3THEDAWNTHRONE_00418_BERUDE_000_012<tab>He he he! One wrong move against me, and you will find yourself pinned flat on your back! Just ask anyone here. They will be able to attest to that.
TEXT_REGOTH3THEDAWNTHRONE_00418_BERUDE_000_020<tab>The Dawn Throne is a holy land, sculpted by the hands of the great Azim himself. It is also the birthplace of his son─the first of our kind.
TEXT_REGOTH3THEDAWNTHRONE_00418_BERUDE_000_021<tab>The Dawn Father's face has been etched into the base of the sacred province─a province we, his children, have been charged with protecting.

TEXT_REGOTH3THEDAWNTHRONE_00418_BERUDE_000_022<tab>From here you can see just how vast the Steppe is, with grasslands that extend onto the distant horizon. It's a breathtaking sight to behold, that has the added advantage of allowing us to observe any advancing beasts or enemy forces.
